forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers and windy conditions developing for the afternoon. High 12C. Winds WSW at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: A steady rain this morning. Windy with showers continuing this afternoon. High 53F. Winds WSW at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Windy with rain likely. Low 8C. Winds SSW at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and wind. Low 46F. Winds SSW at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.fcttext: Windy with light rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High 48F. Winds W at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 80%.
